about_the_game:
US Cities X: Indianapolis from Aerosoft covers the Indianapolis area in FSX:SE with extensive satellite coverage and includes all major buildings and thousands of accurately placed autogen buildings. There are nine detailed heliports, complete with sound effects, and the famous Indianapolis Speedway is also modeled.

Features:


  • Extensive Satellite Image Coverage.
  • All Major Buildings Included.
  • Thousands of Autogen buildings placed realistically.
  • Nine useable heliports in high detail:
    1. 8A4 – Indianapolis Downtown Heliport
    2. I48 – Indianapolis Channel 13
    3. Indianapolis Methodist Hospital (IN06 – Indianapolis Methodist Hospital Upper Level and 81II – Indianapolis Methodist Hospital Lower Level)
    4. 23IN – Indianapolis JW Riley Hospital of Children
    5. 96IN – Indianapolis Medical Center
    6. IN52 – Indianapolis 500 Heliport (Motor Speedway)
    7. 8II8 – Indianapolis Stout Army
    8. 8II7 – Allsion Plant 8
    9. 8II6 – Allsion Plant 5
  • Sound effects near heliports.
  • Includes Indianapolis Speedway.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

short_description: US Cities X: Indianapolis from Aerosoft covers the Indianapolis area in FSX:SE with extensive satellite coverage and includes all major buildings and thousands of accurately placed autogen buildings. There are nine detailed heliports, complete with sound effects, and the famous Indianapolis Speedway is also modeled.
